value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12227v1", "title": "A remark on Euler-like vector fields", "summary": "In this note, we show that (the germ of) each Euler-like vector field comes\nfrom a tubular neighborhood embedding given by the normal exponential map of\nsome Riemannian metric.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-04-16T16:22:43Z"}
